All First time applicants are required to pay a fee of kSh 350, this is however automatically refunded if you DO NOT qualify for a loan.
The Fee is used to confirm your credit history from relevant lending organizations and determines your loan limit. Kindly note that the ksh 350 is only refunded if you DO NOT qualify for the loan. However, if your loan is approved, the ksh 350 will be included in your loan repayment.
More about what we do at \nCapital Loans
What you need to qualify for a loan

We offer loans from 5000 Ksh to 200,000 Ksh to help with all kinds of expenses including car repairs, medical bills, rent, bond, dental work, fees and business startup capital. Applying is simple and we help you work out how much you can afford to borrow. Repayments can be scheduled to suit you and generally occur weekly or fortnightly.
What happens if I don`t pay?

We’re very patient if you need more time to pay talk to us and we can adjust the repayment schedule! We’ll work together and make a payment plan that fits you to avoid consequences such as: Handing over to collection companies Being listed at the Credit Reference Bureau

Capital Loans Kenya is a licensed credit provider that’s offered short term financial solutions for ten years. Having written more than 1.5 million personal loans in Kenya, Capital Loans is a trusted provider that has the expertise to offer you an affordable loan that best suits your situation. We have a long standing relationship with international retail group Pepkor, which operates more than 4000 stores in 15 countries.
Am I eligible to apply for a loan?

To apply for a loan you need to be:
 1. A permanent Kenyan resident
 2. Have a valid government-issued ID
 3. Be at least 18 years of age
 4. Have been an active M-PESA or Airtel money user for at least 2 months.
When will I know if i am approved?

We make sure to keep you updated on the progress of your loan application through regular SMS. If conditionally approved we will contact you to let you know the good news and your funds transferred to your MPESA account afterwards.
How long does it take to get funded?

Loans are usually funded within 30 minutes after approval. In the unlikely event your loan does not get approved, you will promptly be notified via SMS and a FULL REFUND of the 350 Ksh registration fee will be made.
Any fee charges if I pay out my loan early?

No, there are no hidden fees or charges associated with a small personal loan. All charges are disclosed upfront within your contract and there is no penalty fee if you choose to pay out your loan early.
How do I make repayments on my loan?
Loan repayments are scheduled to suit your pay dates and you pay directly to our bank account either weekly or monthly. Our bank details will be sent to you if your loan application is approved.

Welcome to Capital Loans Kenya. We specialize in small loans up to Ksh 200,000.
 Here at Capital Loans we endeavor to make your application/loan experience as easy and hassle free as possible.

 After which it is fully assessed by one of our experienced team members. 
Once it meets our loan requirements, the funds will be transferred to your Mpesa account within 30 minutes. We have an 80% conversion rate on all our clients, and we come highly recommended to their family and friends as we pride ourselves in honesty and reliability. 
Just give us a try and enjoy the Capital Loan experience for yourself.
